folder: 4th Street (East) and Avenue A  , Manhattan, N.Y.
text:
Recreation and Hobbies: Bird raising on East Side roof as viewed southward from another tenement roof on East 4th Street to the west of Avenue A.

The buildings in the foreground are No's. 166 to 170 East 4th Street, that with the pigeon coop atop is No. 168.

In the background appears the steeple of St. Nicholas Catholic Church at No. 125 East 2nd Street.

August 31, 1928
P. L. Sperr

Views 2 and 3 show pigeon coops in the suburban
parts of Brooklyn.

View 2 P.L.Sperr  July 27, 1935
Neg. #2707
View 3: E.L. Armbruster Collection  About 1922
title: Recreation and hobbies - Bird raising.

text:

August 31, 1928

title: General view - [Manhattan - 4th Street - Avenue A (North).]

text:
Fourth Street, southeast corner and Avenue A, looking east.

P. L. Sperr
June 26, 1941
